text: pinpu (atamaip pataittu) atamukku ellap (porulkalin) peyarkalaiyum (avarrin tanmaikalaiyum) karruk kotuttu, avarrai anta vanavarkalukku munpakki â€œ(vanavarkale! Atamukku en piratinitiyaka avatarkuriya takutiyillai enru kurinirkale! Itil) ninkal unmaiyanavarkalaka iruntal (ito unkal munnirukkum) ivarrin peyarkalai enakku ariviyunkal'' enak kurinan
